SUMMARY: The new contract is reportedly for $25.6 million over four years, including $17.75 million guaranteed. Butker is now signed with the Chiefs through 2028

TITLE: Olympics medal count: Team USA wins so far
SUMMARY: The U.S. is most likely looking for a repeat of its formidable presence at the 2020 Tokyo Games, where it won 113 medals

TITLE: Debby updates: Storm made landfall as Category 1 hurricane; at least 4 dead in Florida
SUMMARY: Debby made landfall near Steinhatchee in Florida's Big Bend at 7 a.m. today, with sustained winds of 80 mph

TITLE: Tropical Storm Debby live updates: Heavy rain and 'catastrophic' flooding feared in the Southeast
SUMMARY: Some areas are set to get 15 to 20 inches of rain in the coming days, with widespread flash flooding possible

TITLE: Disney says man can't sue over wife's death because he agreed to Disney+ terms of service
SUMMARY: Jeffrey J. Piccolo filed a wrongful death lawsuit after his wife, Dr. Kanokporn Tangsuan, died after she consumed food containing allergens at a restaurant in Disney World

TITLE: 12-year-old Texas girl dies after parents used smoothies to treat life-threatening injuries
SUMMARY: The mother and stepfather of Miranda Sipps were arrested for failing to seek medical attention for their daughter for four days, leading to her death

TITLE: FDA wants to cut sodium in packaged and processed foods by about 20%
SUMMARY: The agency wants to lower how much salt we consume over the next three years to an average of 2,750 milligrams per day. That's still above the recommended limit of 2,300 mg

TITLE: 4 family members killed in Texas crash caused by street racing; racers face charges in their deaths
SUMMARY: Jaime Mesa, 20, and Anthony Morales, 22, are accused of racing sports cars and causing the deadly crash Saturday night in Grand Prairie, a suburb of Dallas

TITLE: California serial killer in prison for murders of 12 women confesses to another killing
SUMMARY: Authorities in Los Angeles said a man known as the "Riverside Prostitute Killer" confessed to the murder of Cathy Small, 19, after his DNA was linked to the death

TITLE: Four suspects arrested in fatal shooting of 'General Hospital' actor Johnny Wactor
SUMMARY: Wactor was killed in May after he interrupted three people who authorities have said were stealing his car's catalytic converter

TITLE: Jewish man in New York accused of harassing Muslim neighbor for months, trying to kill him
SUMMARY: Izak Kadosh is charged with more than 40 crimes, including second-degree attempted murder and multiple hate crimes, according to a criminal complaint

TITLE: Detroit judge taken off docket after handcuffing teen who fell asleep in his courtroom during field trip
SUMMARY: "Although the Judge was trying to teach a lesson of respect, his methods were unacceptable," a representative for the nonprofit Greening of Detroit said in a statement

TITLE: Tennessee Guardsman found dead and bound with zip ties in 2019 was shot over custody dispute, authorities say
SUMMARY: Hundreds of possible suspects were investigated in Jacob Bishop's killing nearly five years ago. Authorities this week arrested his then-wife and her cousin

TITLE: Hurricane Ernesto strengthens to Category 2 as it moves toward Bermuda
SUMMARY: The storm's maximum sustained winds were blowing at 100 mph on Thursday night. About 287,000 customers were still without power in Puerto Rico

TITLE: A stark social divide: Adults without a college degree more likely to have no close friends
SUMMARY: The share of people who report having no close friends has risen, particularly among those who didn't graduate from college — creating a divide in people’s levels of social connection

TITLE: 3 charged in Kentucky woman's fatal stabbing, but her family says police are at fault, too
SUMMARY: Their lawsuit says that if police had sent someone to the house of a prominent dentist after an unrelated 911 call, she might be alive. The dentist and his son were arrested a year later

TITLE: Hone upgraded to a hurricane, tropical storm warnings remain for Hawaii’s Big Island
SUMMARY: Hone, whose overnight maximum sustained winds reached 75 mph, is forecast to pass near or south of Hawaii County overnight into early Sunday

TITLE: Ozempic maker defends high U.S. price: It’s 'helping' reduce the cost of obesity
SUMMARY: Novo Nordisk's CEO spoke ahead of a Senate committee hearing next month, when he is scheduled to testify about the U.S. pricing of the diabetes and weight loss drugs

TITLE: Lily Allen says she has received death threats after revealing she gave up pandemic puppy
SUMMARY: The singer said on Instagram that the internet took her comments out of context when she revealed she had returned a dog that ate her family's passports

TITLE: Bodycam video shows moment Ohio officer fatally shoots man in U-Haul believed stolen
SUMMARY: The video, which police released Saturday, shows Akron police shooting a 54-year-old man they were trying to arrest during an investigation into the theft of a U-Haul box truck

TITLE: Babe Ruth's 'called shot' jersey sells at auction for over $24 million
SUMMARY: The New York Yankee slugger’s jersey went for a record-breaking $24.12 million after a bidding war that lasted over six hours in Dallas

TITLE: Closings set in trial of ex-politician accused of killing Las Vegas investigative reporter
SUMMARY: Robert Telles won’t return again to the witness stand before a jury panel of seven men and seven women is pared to 12

TITLE: Alaska landslide kills 1 person and injures 3 in Ketchikan, authorities say
SUMMARY: “In my 65 years in Ketchikan, I have never seen a slide of this magnitude," city Mayor Dave Kiffer said in a statement

TITLE: Florida surgeon mistakenly removes patient's liver instead of spleen, causing him to die, widow says
SUMMARY: A general surgeon removed William Bryan's liver instead of his spleen, causing his death on the operating room table, according to an attorney for Beverly Bryan

TITLE: Teen charged with attempted murder in shooting of 49ers' Ricky Pearsall
SUMMARY: Pearsall is recovering after being shot in the chest in what has been described as an attempted robbery

TITLE: 'Rust' prosecutor asks judge to reconsider dismissal of Alec Baldwin's criminal case
SUMMARY: New Mexico special prosecutor Kari T. Morrissey said in court documents Wednesday that the grounds for dismissing the actor's trial in July were irrelevant

TITLE: Wildlife trafficking ring killed at least 118 eagles, prosecutors say
SUMMARY: Travis John Branson made between $180,000 and $360,000 from 2009 to 2021 selling bald and golden eagle parts illegally, according to federal prosecutors

TITLE: U.S. Navy sailor detained in Venezuela, officials say
SUMMARY: A U.S. State Department spokesperson said the department was tracking the service member’s detention and monitoring the situation

TITLE: Footage of motorcade racing JFK to the hospital after he was shot is set to go to auction
SUMMARY: RR Auction will offer up the 8 mm home film in Boston on Sept. 28

TITLE: Justice Department investigating sexual abuse allegations at California women’s prisons
SUMMARY: Correctional staff are accused of seeking sexual favors in return for contraband and other privileges, according to the Justice Department

TITLE: Ex-Green Beret behind failed Venezuela raid released pending trial on weapons charges
SUMMARY: Jordan Goudreau was arrested in July after a four-year investigation into a raid that ended with several combatants killed by Venezuelan security forces

TITLE: Independent pharmacies are left waiting for Covid vaccines
SUMMARY: Pharmacists say many of their doses are delayed, which means turning patients away

TITLE: Will Taylor Swift return as Chiefs cheerleader for 2024-25 season?
SUMMARY: Swift made appearances at 13 Chiefs games last season to watch boyfriend Travis Kelce and his team. He was also spotted at some of her Eras Tour concerts
